fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation

Class Coordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.ResourceInspector
        • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation.adapterlargescale.AdapterComponent
          • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step3.largescalecoordination.implementation.Coordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, DataPushDispatcherReceiverI, CoordinationLargeScaleI

    public class Coordinator
extends AdapterComponent
implements CoordinationLargeScaleI

    Coordinator

    represents an autonomic controller extends AdapterRequestDispatcher and it's a coordinator who interact with other autonomic controllers and submit decisions to the AdmissionControllerCoordination he takes resources from the network and put it back to continue the cooperation with other autonomic controllers.
    Version:
    21.01.2018
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
